thread.title: Hughie Maughan explains what really happened to his fake tan on Dancing With The Stars
thread.title_full: Hughie Maughan explains what really happened to his fake tan on Dancing With The Stars

author: Sharon McGowan
title: Hughie Maughan explains what really happened to his fake tan on Dancing With The Stars
text:
TV Hughie Maughan explains what really happened to his fake tan on Dancing With The Stars Although Sunday was ladies night on the RTE show, the Big Brother star stole the show with his makeup faux pas Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Hughie Maughan has confessed he was wearing Voice Of Ireland coach Jamelia’s makeup to try and fix his fake tan disaster on Dancing With The Stars. 
Although Sunday was ladies night on the RTE show, the Big Brother star stole the show with his makeup faux pas. 
Hughie explained that the show’s makeup artists used the same foundation that was used on Jamelia because his deep fake tan. 
Hughie said: “What happened was I got to the studios and I started sweating because we’d been rehearsing all day in these massive heavy clothes underneath all the lights Hughie Maughan has confessed he was wearing Voice Of Ireland coach Jamelia’s makeup to try and fix his fake tan disaster on Dancing With The Stars 
“I had to constantly wipe my face and I ended up looking like a Dalmation. 
“It was all patchy so we had to get this foundation you’d normally use for African skin - it was actually the same foundation the makeup artist used for Jamelia on the Voice [Of Ireland]. Read More Ryan Ruckledge and Hughie Maughan engaged! Big Brother couple confirm they're planning 'Big Gay Gypsy Wedding' 
“It was obviously for a black person and I’m white. 
“When we put it on we realised how dark it was and then it was two minutes to air and there was nothing we could do. Although Sunday was ladies night on the RTE show, the Big Brother star stole the show with his makeup faux pas 
“The other stuff they had wasn’t dark enough because the tan that was on my face.” 
Hughie said he laughed it off when people made comments about his appearance on the show, saying he has “thick elephant skin’. 
“The entire place was staring at me and the whole studio was looking at me, laughing and were gobsmacked,” he told Ryan Tubridy on RTE Radio One. 
“I just started smiling. I’m not a shy person and for the bad comments - they can get a grip. This is what Hughie looks like on a normal day 
“I just found it funny. I’m one of those types of people, I’m bonkers when it comes to certain things. 
“It’s made people speak about me which is probably a good thing, I am on a TV show… Isn’t that the point of television.” 
Hughie has become a viral sensation because of the makeup “mistake” and a talking point around the world. 
“This morning I seen a clip of a chat show in America and they spoke about my tan,” he said. The cast of TOWIE would even cringe at THIS 
“That’s just weird. It was a genuine mistake, if I had planned that probably nobody would speak about it. 
“It was a genuine mistake, trying to make a bad situation better and it just got worse. 
“I came from the Big Brother house. I’m not a professional athlete, I came from a trashy reality TV show and I’ll probably go into another trashy reality show after Dancing With The Stars.” Like us on Facebook
